articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Spotify to shut off Car Thing for good, leading users to demand refunds - TechCrunch
articles.description: Spotify is notifying users of its Car Thing product that the devices will stop working after December 9, 2024.
articles.content: Spotify is notifying customers who purchased its Car Thing product that the devices will stop working after December 9, 2024. The company discontinued the device back in July 2022, but had said at th… [+2005 chars]

articles.author: David Pierce
articles.title: Daylight DC1: a new tablet with a better screen and no blue backlight - The Verge
articles.description: Daylight Computer is claiming to have invented a new kind of display, which it calls LivePaper, and has built a new tablet that it says will help reset our relationship with tech.
articles.content:
The Daylight DC1 is a $799 attempt to build a calmer computer
